title: issue: Cannot submit form in React Native
body:
### Version Number

7.41.4

### Codesandbox/Expo snack

https://snack.expo.dev/q7vrP6Y-1

### Steps to reproduce

1. Submit form
2. See error

### Expected behaviour

`onSubmit` function should be invoked

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

_No response_

### Relevant log output
